message: Confirmed exact CLI/env surface for QA plan: main.py exposes --plc/--hostname/--auto-discover/--byte-order/--doctor; tools/plc_cli supports connect-test/read/write with --mode, --hostname, --auto-discover, and --byte-order {abcd,badc,cdab,dcba}.

data.discovery: auto-discover path prioritizes hostname -> discovery -> static IP
